resources.string: GameShop is Pakistan\'s first and complete online gaming store app

By continuing, you accept GameShop may use technology to collect performance and usage data to provide a better experience. This also includes showing you a more relevant advertisement. You can always adjust preference in settings.

Gameshop is Pakistan’s 1st and complete online gaming store app where a customer can find and buy any of gaming product like latest gen consoles, high tech pc’s etc. They also can trade of their gaming goods at best price. Through our ‘Eat n Play’ feature, players can get redeemable points as they play and progress in our free mobile games and that points can be redeemable at our partner restaurants.
